field.label: Bootstrap Grid
field.comment: This is the Bootstrap Grid component. It's used on various Home Pages and facilitates the proper allocation of space on multiple sections of the store. This Design Element should not be disabled.

field.label: Core Icons
field.comment: This Design Element enables the use of core theme icons. These are used for elements such as the mini cart and search icons. This Design Element should not be disabled.

field.label: Extended Icons
field.comment: These are optional, additional icons that are not part of the core theme icons. They are not used out of the box unless they've been added via customizations. For example, a list of Custom Icons can be found here: Pearl Theme Styled icons

field.label: Tables
field.comment: This is the Bootstrap Tables Component. It's not actively used out of the box on any theme pages and should only be enabled if you need to use Bootstrap Tables. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Tables

field.label: Toggle, Accordion and Tabs
field.comment: This Design Element introduces the Toggles, Accordions, and Tabs component. This is used on Product Page V2 and should not be disabled unless you don't plan on using this Product Page.

field.label: Pricing Boxes
field.comment: This Design Element is not used anywhere in the theme out of the box and should only be enabled if you need to implement Pricing Boxes. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Pricing Boxes

field.label: Headings And Blockquotes
field.comment: This Design Element is not used anywhere in the theme out of the box and should only be enabled if you need to display Headings and Blockquotes. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Headings

field.label: Dividers
field.comment: This Design Element is not used anywhere in the theme out of the box and should only be enabled if you need to use Dividers on your pages. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Dividers

field.label: Brand lists
field.comment: Brand Lists are not used anywhere out of the box, however, this Design Element is also tied to the Testimonials Design Element. It's important to keep it enabled if you're using Testimonials anywhere on the store. If you're not using Brand Lists or Testimonials, you can disable it. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Brand Lists

field.label: Responsive And Helpers
field.comment: This Design Element is used to implement various CSS classes that allow for responsive designs with the Pearl Theme. It's used on multiple pages and should not be disabled.

field.label: Smooth Scrolling
field.comment: This Design Element can be used to add Smooth Scrolling animations to anchor links. If you haven't implemented this manually on your website, it should be disabled.

field.label: Core Icon boxes
field.comment: This Design Element is used on Home Page v12. You can safely disable it if you're not using this Home Page, or if you're not planning on using Icon/Feature Boxes anywhere on the store.

field.label: Extended Icon boxes
field.comment: This Design Element is not used anywhere in the theme out of the box and should only be enabled if you need to display Icon Boxes on your pages. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Icon Boxes

field.label: Alert boxes
field.comment: These are Bootstrap Alerts. They aren't used out of the box and should be disabled unless you plan on explicitly customizing something to use them. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Alert Boxes

field.label: Testimonials
field.comment: Testimonials are used on Home Page V10 and Home Page V11. If you're not using either of these and don't plan on displaying Testimonials on any other page, you can disable this Design Element. Other examples can be found here: Pearl Theme Testimonials

field.label: Flex Slider
field.comment: The Flex Slider Design Element is used for the Testimonials Slider (presented on Pearl Theme Testimonials) so if you're using this, it should be kept enabled. If you're not using the Testimonials Slider, you can disable this Design Element.

field.label: Buttons
field.comment: This Design Element is not used anywhere in the theme out of the box and should only be enabled if you need to display Custom Buttons on your pages. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme Buttons

field.label: Sections
field.comment: Enable/Disable the Sections component.

field.label: Parallax
field.comment: Used on Home Page V2 (top Hero Banner) for the Parallax effect. If you're not using this home page or have not manually introduced the Parallax effect via customizations anywhere else on the store, this Design Element should be disabled.

field.label: Core Animations
field.comment: This Design Element introduces core theme animations and should be kept enabled.Extended Animations - Animations that are not part of the core theme Animations. They are not used out of the box and should be disabled unless they've been added manually via customizations.

field.label: Extended Animations
field.comment: Enable/Disable the Animations component.

field.label: AOS Animation
field.comment: This Design Element uses an external animation library that is not used anywhere out of the box. If you haven't manually added them to your store, it should be disabled. An example can be found here: Pearl Theme AOS Animations

field.label: Activate Back To Top Button
field.comment: Enable Advanced Back To Top On Product Page - Only affects the Product Pages. Adds the Advanced Back to Top button. An example can be seen here: Advanced Back to Top

field.label: Show button after "x" pixels of scroll down
field.comment: Set when the "Back To Top" button will appear: when the user scrolls down to the 300px mark. The default value: 300

field.label: Reduce the opacity of "Back To Top" button after "x" pixels of scroll down
field.comment: Set number pixels after which the "Back To Top" button opacity is reduced. The default value is 1200.

field.label: Duration of the top scrolling animation
field.comment: Duration of the top scrolling animation in milliseconds. The default value is 700.

field.label: Auto-jump to Top when click on Collapsible Widgets
Magento calendar.css
field.comment: Enable or Disable the loading of the Magento default calendar.css library.

group.label: Advanced Back To Top On Product Page

field.comment: Activate Back To Top Button option must be enabled.

field.label: Enable Advanced Back To Top On Product Page
field.comment: Only affects the Product Pages. Adds the Advanced Back to Top button. An example can be seen here: Advanced Back to Top

field.label: Text Label on Back to top
field.comment: Insert custom text to be displayed on Advanced Back to Top button. Leave empty for no label.

field.label: Show Product image on Back to top
Show reviews on Back to top
Show product Price on Back to top
Back To Top Background Color
field.comment: Set color the background of Back To Top Button . Example: #000000

field.label: Button Box Shadow
field.comment: Insert shadow values for the Back To Top Button on product page. Example: 0px 5px 30px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)

field.label: Back To Top Border Width
field.comment: Insert border width for Back To Top Button on product page. Example: 1px

field.label: Back To Top Border Color
field.comment: Select color for Back To Top Button border. Example: #FFFFFF
